title: Export Character Sheet
description:
📜 Module Description
📖 D&D 5e Standard Character Sheet is a Foundry VTT module that adds a button to Dungeons & Dragons 5e character sheets.
With a single click, it converts the digital sheet into the official D&D 5e character sheet format, allowing for printing or exporting as a PDF for easy sharing.

🔹 Key Features:
✔️ Adds a button to the character sheet for instant conversion.
✔️ Generates a customizable official D&D 5e character sheet.
✔️ Allows printing or PDF export.
✔️ Retains all essential information, including attributes, skills, equipment, and spells.
